## Resource Content

```json
{
  "resourceType" : "QuestionnaireResponse",
  "id" : "FMAUEMotorQuestionnaireResponseExample",
  "meta" : {
    "profile" : [
      "http://example.org/StructureDefinition/SPACQuestionnaireResponse"
    ]
  },
  "questionnaire" : "http://example.org/fhir/Questionnaire/FMAUEMotorQuestionnaireInstance",
  "status" : "completed",
  "subject" : {
    "reference" : "Patient/PatientPACExample"
  },
  "authored" : "2023-10-01T10:00:00+08:00",
  "item" : [
    {
      "linkId" : "assessment-phase-fmaue-motion",
      "text" : "請選擇評估階段",
      "answer" : [
        {
          "valueString" : "初評"
        }
      ]
    },
```
